name: Pixel Table Tennis
description:
This is your worst day. You are facing best tennis player in The World. You are trying to get score, but that is really hard. He is better player that you. Can you win him? Let see. Good luck to you.

Game made by GameJam Pro team
For Datorium Summer GameJam 2021

Team:

  • ArttX
    • Art maker
    • Sound Effects
    • Code
    • Unity physics managment
    • Layout managment
  • artisDD
    • Moral boost

Game have leaderboard, so all scores are saved is database.

So be sure about your nickname choice.

Music from  opengameart.org

Sounds generated

All art made by ArttX
